about_the_game:
Dreadsite Survival is a Post-Apocalyptic 8K Open World Multiplayer Online Survival Game developed and published by Xi Studios. This survival game, immerses you in a 4 year Post Apocalypse Infested Unique Earth Landscape where humanity is fighting endlessly & teaming up to take back control of the infected hordes! But not only that, there are groups of rogue drifters to contend with, they want to kill you and take everything you own. CAN YOU STAY ALIVE!

Gameplay Features:

  • Looting Items, Using Abandoned homes & structures to help defend you & your team.

  • Hunting, Farming, Foraging Food & Finding Water to Drink.

  • Third Person With True First Person.

  • Drivable vehicles. (With Vehicle Mechanics)

  • XP and Skill Levelling System.

  • Character Weather State Effects.

  • Character Attribute States. (Healthy/Wounded/Sick/Infected/Poisoned/Drunk/Fatigued/Bleeding & Stunned)

  • Crafting, Building, Fortification and Raiding.

  • Weather and Day/Night Cycles.

  • 8k Open World Environment to Explore.

The great mysterious outbreak has recently passed, but 4 years later the undead hordes still infest the land in considerable numbers in a broken down civilization. Zombies hunt in pacts by night & are more scattered in the day. Drifters hunt in numbers and will stop at nothing to kill you. Stay alert and quiet to avoid attracting either of them, and be prepared to either run or fight for your life at a moment’s notice. How good are your survival skills?

Possessions are worth more then gold in this post apocalypse open world, but so are materials. Scavenge for raw materials & supplies, trade with friends, craft items, and build self sustaining off-grid style bases to rest & protect against dangers, both the infected & the living, you never know what may lurk around every corner!

Gathering raw materials & supplies is a important part of crafting. Axes, pickaxes, and crowbars allow you to harvest the various trees, rocks, and vehicles scattered around the world. You should collect what you can, when you’re not actively fending off threats.

The first step in re-establishing society is to solidify a foothold in the struggle against a broken down civilization, is by building a Off Grid Base. Each location has unique advantages and disadvantages, so it’s wise to explore the map before making a commitment to a specific area. Build small bases or massive compounds, the choice is up to you!

Those that want to travel safely, access contested locations, and successfully defend their BASE will want to work in groups with other players to fight off the infected, NPC's and enemy players.

Are you ready for the awakening apocalypse?! Do you have what it takes to thrive not Just Survive!?!

name: Dreadsite Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Graphics: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Graphics: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX12 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on Epic quality settings.

short_description: In Dreadsite Survival, players awaken in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by an unknown cataclysm. As survivors, they must navigate a treacherous landscape teeming with infected hordes and rogue drifters. The objective of the game is to stay alive and thrive in this hostile environment.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
